      • checkPermission

        public static void checkPermission(Context mContext,
                   DJIGerneralListener mListener)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Check the sdk permission
        Parameters:
        mContext - The application context
        mListener - The check real result
              0 Get Permission Successful
              -1 Cannot connect to internet
              -2 Meta data invalid
              -3 AES 256 unsupported
              -4 Device id cannot got
              -5 AES 256 encrypt failed
              -6 Parser Permission data faild
              -7 App key forbidden
              -8 Active device num is up to the most allow num
              -9 Parser requesting url error
              -10 Unkown error
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
